evidence.claim: CAVU HCM utilizes FHIR for healthcare data interoperability.
The platform complies with HIPAA regulations for data handling.
CAVU HCM supports X12 EDI transactions including 837 and 835.
Integration patterns include HL7 messaging protocols for electronic health records.

icp.icp_reason: Company engages in healthcare tech using X12 transactions, aligns with API automation.
